1609922680_1DruyFehQkemWTK5XKuFRpXb3tz89.body: bitcoin protocol [SHA256] is for information/data integrity verification, not encryption. That means that it can't be utilized for making data unreadable, it is only to make sure that the data is in fact correct and has not been corrupted by any kind of cyberattack.
